name: 组合数学
complexity: Varies by specific problem (e.g., O(n log n) for generating functions, O(n^2) for DP counting)
scenarios: Counting labeled/unlabeled graphs, trees, connected components, isomorphisms, sequences, polynomials, and combinatorial structures; used in problems involving enumeration, probability, and generating functions.
extensions: Generating functions, Polya enumeration theorem, Burnside's lemma, inclusion-exclusion principle, recurrence relations, Stirling numbers, Catalan numbers, partition numbers, tree counting formulas, graph enumeration.
